DOC.brief_summary: Continuous ropivacaine infusion sternotomy wound coronary artery bypass grafting ( CABG ) heart valve surgery diminish postoperative pain .
DOC.detailed_description: A multiporous catheter introduce sternotomy wound CABG heart valve surgery patient continuous ropivacaine infusion 4 ml/h start immediately surgery . Ropivacaine infusion administer 48 postoperative hour . All patient receive patient control analgesia ( PCA ) oxycodone extubation PACU . All patient receive standardize anesthesia surgery .
DOC.criteria: Elective CABG heart valve surgery patient Psychic disorder Sleep apnea syndrome Diabetes mellitus ( insulin dependent ) Obesity , body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 35 Cardiac insufficiency , ejection fraction ( EF ) ≤ 30
